properties.title: Brambrüesch - Chur's mountain
properties.abstract: Directly above Chur and easily reached with the cable car is Brambrüesch where in summer or winter there is a wide range of activities to enjoy.
properties.description:
This natural terrace stretches the length of the mountain ridge from Chur to the Dreibündenstein – at the heart of cantonal history. Hikers or nature lovers find this a perfect paradise close to the city. For bikers and dirt surfers it also offers an unforgettable experience. The beautiful alp Malix and the bang up-to-date lifts combine both tradition and tourism. Welcome to this natural paradise!

Tip for bikers a new attraction – Freeride mountain-biking combines different disciplines, such as cross country, dirt-jumping and downhill. Recently, the Swiss Freeride course was transferred to the «Alpenbikepark», also found on Brambrüesch. The bike trail covers most of the newly-designed course used in the championship.
properties.name: Chur Tourismus
